title: Generative AI-Enabled Learning Design-Based WebQuest Project Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in mechanical engineering and understanding of secondary education environments
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, emphasizing practical applicability in real educational settings as a current practitioner

learning_goals: Learners can brainstorm ideas and design prototypes for mathematics education content using generative AI tools.
Learners plan, develop, and incorporate peer feedback into a webquest project based on the LBD framework.
Learners critically analyze and revise generative AI outputs to produce final deliverables suitable for educational contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
